title: Ticket #5144: Change "Condor" to "HTCondor" in DAGMan messages
description:
From Karen Miller:

When you are already making other changes to DAGMan, might you change some output messages, such that where the messages now say 'Condor' they can instead say 'HTCondor' ?

I'm especially suggesting this for the output generated when a DAG is submitted, such as 

   File for submitting this DAG to Condor
     . . .

Not a needed change in any way, but it'd be nice.
remarks:
2015-Jul-23 15:13:47 by wenger:
This is done (except for version history) on V8_3-gittrac_5144-branch. That branch should get merged to master (and a version history entry added) when master becomes 8.5 (it's currently still 8.3).

2015-Aug-27 13:51:02 by wenger:
Just added a version history item and merged this, so I'm going to resolve the ticket.

2015-Aug-27 13:57:38 by wenger:
Ah, I forgot that some of the tests need to be changed to match the output changes...

2015-Sep-23 13:07:25 by wenger:
This was, in fact, documented in the 8.5.0 version history already, so I'm going to resolve it...
